history.content:
We have been concerned by some of the recent trolling on this website. Bullying and harassing will not be tolerated.  Students who witness or experience hostile or concerning behavior on campus or online should alert Student Affairs staff.  Hostile or concerning behavior may also be a sign that a student is in need of help. Staff can help to assess these issues and refer incidents on to campus resources including: Student Conduct, Students of Concern, Office for the Prevention of  Harassment and Discrimination (OPHD), and the UC Police Department, as appropriate.

The EECS Department is committed to maintaining a safe and welcoming environment for all students and we appreciate your efforts to create a welcoming community.
